title: Invoice Tracker

emptyState.title: No invoices yet
emptyState.description: Upload a JSON file to get started with tracking your invoices.

modal.title: Upload Invoice JSON
modal.description: Upload a JSON file containing invoice data to import into the tracker.
modal.dropzone: Drop your JSON file here or click to browse

tablePreview: Table preview containing the invoice data from the uploaded JSON.
jsonMustBeArray: JSON must be an array of invoices
failedToParseJson: Failed to parse JSON file. Please check the file format.
failedToUploadRetry: Failed to upload invoices. Please try again.

toast.uploadSuccessDescription: Your invoices have been imported successfully.
toast.uploadErrorDescription: Failed to upload invoices. Please try again.
toast.parseErrorDescription: Failed to parse JSON file. Please check the file format.
toast.fileErrorDescription: An error occurred while processing the file.
